1000100101100111 1100010001011101 1 -> sum: 0100110111000101, cout: 1
0010001001000101 1010011001001011 1 -> sum: 1100100010010001, cout: 0
0100111001111011 0010001010101000 0 -> sum: 0111000100100011, cout: 0
0011111100101011 1001010101001100 1 -> sum: 1101010001111000, cout: 0
0100110010010100 1111001010000000 0 -> sum: 0011111100010100, cout: 1
0010010000010010 1011101101101100 0 -> sum: 1101111101111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
